title: Google Assistant in Chrome, powered by Duplex, can now auto-change stolen passwords
content:
At I/O 2021, Google announced that Assistant would help you change stolen credentials. This Google Assistant-branded, Duplex-powered capability for changing passwords is now rolling out in Chrome for Android.

moreâ€¦

The post Google Assistant in Chrome, powered by Duplex, can now auto-change stolen passwords appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google's Assistant-branded, Duplex-powered auto-password changer is now rolling out in Chrome for Android after being announced at I/O 2021...
